title: The worst part of the movie was the title.
review: I've never seen the original Bladerunner nor have I read the books so I don't know if it references to some written prose unknown to me, but Bladerunner 2049??? Seriously??? What I saw in this movie looks like technology from 2149 ðŸ¤” If this is what the future looks like 31 years from NOW, I don't want to be apart of it.
